alert.note: Alert for North Snowy Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 17 at 1:53PM MST until February 19 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...West winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts up to 70 mph possible. * WHERE...North Snowy Range Foothills. * WHEN...From Saturday morning through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight or high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
